sources.title: 1997 - Mr. Jealousy - When love turns into a full-time surveillance operation!
sources.description:
Neurotic writer Lester Grimm becomes obsessed with his girlfriend Ramona Ray's ex-lover, novelist Vince. He infiltrates Vince's therapy group under a fake identity, sparking a chain reaction of comedic chaos and self-sabotage.

Original Title: Mr. Jealousy (1997)

metadata.Plot: Lester is an occasional substitute teacher and he's very jealous. He is jealous about the last boyfriend of Lester's slightly wacky current partner Ramona - arrogant best-selling author Dashiell. Lester joins Dashiell's therapy group under an alias to find out if Dashiell still has any feelings for her.
metadata.Actors: Eric Stoltz, Annabella Sciorra, Chris Eigeman
